resources.string: You Are(Were) In The Zone Of...

Autonomous Sensory Meridian Response. It is a term for an experience characterized by a static-like or tingling sensation on the skin that typically begins on the scalp and moves down the back of the neck and upper spine when listening to a certain sound. By listening to these nature sound, you can expect some benefit of A.S.M.R!
(Email will be sent when you click the envelope icon)
She likes listening to nature sound for meditation!
Click button to listen to each sound(Other buttons are disabled until you pause). To pause, click the current button again, please.
